page.title: 03EDUCATION RECREATION TOURISM
page.content: There are at present four first or primary{schools}in the area. At the age of 9, most pupils from these schools enter Ferndown Middle or West Moors Middle and go on to Ferndown Upper at the age of 13. Before the Elementary school was built in 1915, children attended the village schools in{Hampreston}and{West Moors. The{sports centre}has facilities for squash, badminton, gymnastics etc. as well as two swimming pools, one for beginners and one for the more advanced swimmers. Courses are run at the centre all year round for many different sports. There are several{hotels.}The most expensive,{The Dormy,}is near the{golf {course}and in an expensive residential area. The Ferndown golf course has been the venue for many important national and international matches.
